dict.acceptation: 顾问，劝告者；（美大学）指导教授，导师；

sent.orig: I am submitting the claim for damages in accordance with the advice of our legal adviser.
sent.trans: 根据我们法律顾问的建议，我提出获得损失赔偿金的要求。

sent.orig: She owes me $200; The thesis owes much to his adviser.
sent.trans: 她欠我$200；这篇论文亏欠了他的指导老师。

sent.orig: Hannah: Maybe it would be best to get some advice from the student adviser.
sent.trans: 汉娜：也许，我们向学生辅导员请教是最好的。

sent.orig: A second government adviser, Hu Angang, has said China should start cutting overall emissions from 2020.
sent.trans: 另一名政府顾问胡鞍钢则表示，中国应从2020年起全面减少排放量。
